short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A brand new look for your Google Chrome, every day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace each moment with Time Splash, the Chrome extension that turns your new tab into a canvas of inspiration. Say goodbye to mundane start pages and welcome a daily dose of motivation with our unique time and background experience.

Features:
- Time Display: Stay on schedule with a sleek and minimalistic digital clock prominently displayed on your new tab page. Easily glance at the time without sacrificing style.
- Daily Changing Backgrounds: Immerse yourself in a world of inspiration with captivating backgrounds that change every day. From stunning landscapes to artistic visuals, each day offers a fresh backdrop to enhance your browsing experience.
- Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrate Time Splash into your daily routine. The extension automatically updates with the current date and time, making it a hassle-free addition to your browsing experience.

How to use:
- Install Time Splash: Simply add the extension to Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
- Open a New Tab: Witness the magic unfold every time you open a new tab, revealing a beautiful backdrop and the current time.
- Get Inspired: Let the changing backgrounds inspire you throughout the day, creating a positive and uplifting atmosphere as you browse.

Why Time Splash?
- Boost Productivity: A well-designed workspace enhances focus and productivity. Time Splash provides a visually stimulating environment to keep you motivated and engaged.
- Daily Inspiration: Break away from the monotony with a fresh dose of inspiration every day. Whether it's a scenic view, a motivational quote, or a piece of art, Time Splash keeps things exciting.

Transform your browsing routine with Time Splash. Install now and let the beauty of time and inspiration merge on every new tab!
